data.title: Horsham District Council
data.meta_description: Local authority providing a range of public services to residents and businesses. Making Horsham District a great place to live, work and visit.
data.text:
Building Control and regulations

Make an application, book a site inspection, demolition and dangerous structures

Business

Start or grow your business, finance and funding, available premises

Climate and environment

How we are reducing our emissions and tackling climate change

Community and wellbeing

Support for you, your family, and community groups. Plus, support for Ukraine

Council, democracy and elections

Elections, Council meetings and decisions and our Corporate Plan

Council Tax and Benefits

Make a payment, manage your account, apply for benefits

Data Protection and Freedom of Information

Request information and view our open data

Environmental health

Noise nuisances, environment protection, housing standards, home adaptation grants and food safety

Housing

Apply for housing, tell us you're facing homelessness, temporary accommodation

Jobs and careers

Current vacancies and our employment support schemes

Licensing

Includes licensing for taxis, animals, gambling, premises and alcohol

Parking

Car parks, on-street parking permits and parking fines

Parks and countryside

Play areas, parks and open spaces, sports facilities and things to do

Planning and development

Includes planning applications, neighbourhood plans, Local Plan, street naming and enforcement

Recycling, waste and bins

Bin collections, new bins, recycling services and special collections

Safety and emergencies

Neighbourhood wardens, emergency planning, protecting yourself and your family

Sport and leisure

Leisure centres, walking and cycling, inclusive activities, Leisure Access Card
